dct_title_s: Old Boston, compiled from the Book of possessions
dct_description_sm: Date of situation approximately 1640.; Cadastral map showing property owners.; Relief shown by hachures.; Oriented with north to the upper right.; Includes sheet index and list of property owners.; Photo negative photocopy.
dct_publisher_sm: Trustees of the Boston Public Library (Boston)
